home.title: David Nguyen
home.paragraph1: Specializing in real estate consulting and brokerage nationwide, with focus on two key markets: Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City.
home.paragraph2: Since 2021, David Nguyen has accompanied many clients in the process of buying, selling, leasing and investing in diverse segments: premium apartments, shophouses, duplexes, penthouses... With close cooperation with reputable developers such as Masterise Homes, Vinhomes, Novaland, Keppel Land..., David Nguyen always places trust, transparency and customer satisfaction as top priorities.

items.title: Real Estate Consulting
items.description: Diverse products, standard quality projects, complete legal consulting

items.title: Management & Operation
items.description: Asset management and rental exploitation to create passive income streams

items.title: Financial Consulting
items.description: Financial solutions to help customers buy a home suitable for their budget

items.title: Procedure Support
items.description: Support for customers with clear legal procedures for real estate

about.title: About David Nguyen
about.introduction: I am {name}, a real estate consultant with over {years} years of experience, selling nationwide specializing in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City, focusing on premium apartments, shophouses and central Ho Chi Minh City properties.

strengths.title: Strengths
strengths.description: My strengths are deep understanding of legal procedures, sales policies of developers and helping clients optimize finance and cash flow when investing.
